snippet.title: Flappin Nutz: Trailer in the Skies
snippet.description:
"Flappin Nutz" is the highly anticipated shmup of this or any century!  Think you have what it takes to soar with Sky Captain Doggles and Colonel Stanlee "Hellfire" Mihalek as they embark on their epic journey of romantic vengeance against the avian scum?!

Well show us how badly you dream of "Flappin Nutz" hitting the Steam Store! That's right, for the cost $0 dollars and about 5 minutes of your time you can ensure that we're on the path to glorious Indie Game Fame! So please accept destiny and click on the links below or follow the video.

VOTE for us on STEAM GREEN LIGHT:


FOLLOW US ON
=============
